text: Muriel Winifred Turner, Baroness Turner of Camden (n√©e Price; 18 September 1927) was a British Labour politician. She was a ranking member of British Parliamentary Committee for Iran Freedom. She was also Vice-President of the British Humanist Association. She was created a Life Peer on 29 May 1985 taking the title Baroness Turner of Camden, of Camden in Greater London. She was born in London. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:Politicians from London
title: Muriel Turner, Baroness Turner of Camden
